duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform maintenance, repair, installation, and modification of sawmill equipment to maximize uptime, quality, and productivity.
Demonstrate superior troubleshooting skills in resolving equipment issues.
Communicate effectively and work independently or as part of a team.
Apply solid background in heavy industry and construction to maintain equipment.
Utilize knowledge of lumber manufacturing process and experience with welding procedures and equipment reliability.
Work 12 hour shifts to meet operational requirements.

education_certification.credential: Industrial Maintenance background preferred. Willing to train candidates with maintenance background.
